uk.ac.uea.framework.implementation

Class AndroidFileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.uea.framework.implementation.AndroidFileIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileIO

    public class AndroidFileIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileIO
    Implementation of the FileIO class interface.

    Handles reading and writing to a file as well as reading assets.

      • getSharedPref

        public SharedPreferences getSharedPref()
        Gets the preferences set on the application.

        SharedPreferences object points to a file containing key-value pairs which stores preferences saved by the user. Saved values persists even when the application is closed. Used to saved user progress

        Specified by:
